thread.title: Mohanlal is all praise for Peter Hein!
thread.title_full: Mohanlal is all praise for Peter Hein! - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Mohanlal is all praise for Peter Hein!
text:
Bahubali had been an awe inspiring spectacle in terms of its larger than life characters for movie buffs.
It was magnificent to the extent that Mohanlal could not resist showering praises on the film and the technicians.
In a recent award function, the actor said that the film has been not just a grand success of the Telugu film industry, but it can be termed as the triumph of the South India industry as well. He congratulated Peter Hein for creating spellbinding action scenes in the film and all those who worked behind to make it a memorable movie.
